1.SceneDescription:
Chandler's hotel room in Tulsa. He's fast asleep when the telephone 
rings.

lines.Line:
(picking up the telephone, answering it with a frog in his throat) 
Hello? (he clears his throat, but he still has the same frog in his throat when 
he speaks again) Hello
(in her apartment, screaming) I LOVE MY NEW JOB
Honey, you're screaming

YOU BET YOUR ASS I AM! I just had the best first day ever! The 
kitchen: twice as big as Allessandro's
(yawning) Oh, that's great
(yawning) Oh, that's great

Yeah, a-a-and clean. Not just health department clean... Monica 
clean
(clearly not so interested) Awesome

Oh, and the people are so nice. There's this one guy, Geoffrey, he's 
the Maitre D., Chandler, you will love him. He is without a doubt, the funniest 
guy I have ever met. (Chandler, who was almost asleep again, sits up straight in 
bed in an instant and can't believe what he just heard.

2.SceneDescription:
Ross and Rachel's apartment. Both of them sitting on the couch, 
interviewing a nanny candidate.

lines.Line:
So I don't go back to work for another four weeks, but we would like 
our nanny to start right away, so that Emma could get a chance to know her

(in a sweet, caring voice) I think that's really smart. 
The easier we can make the transition for her, the better. (Ross and Rachel seem 
pleased with the answer.
That's great, great. So do you have any questions for us
Not really
Not really

Allright. Well thank you so much for coming... (they're standing up 
and make their way to the door
Thank you
Thank you
Really nice to meet you... and we'll call you

Oh, you know, wait. I do have one question. (she starts 
playing with her hair) Do you guys do random drug testing
Boy, we uhm... hadn't really thought of that

That's cool. But... but if you do, I'm gonna need three 
days notice

Okidoki! (and she slams the door in the nanny's face while Ross 
crumples up the application form) Wow! We're never gonna find a nanny

Oh, come on Rach, we will. I promise. We have more interviews (They sit 
down and Rachel sighs) And worse comes to worse, we can always reconsider the 
uhm... the first one we met with
(indignant) What, the blonde with no bra
(indignant) What, the blonde with no bra

She was blonde? (he looks surprised for a while, but then gets a 
"gotcha" expression on his face... There's knocking at the door.) Just a sec.! 
Okay, okay. This one's name is Sandy. She's got a degree in early childhood 
education, uhm... she worked for her last family for three years
Okay... (Ross opens the door.
Okay... (Ross opens the door.
(a guy) Hi... I'm Sandy
And she's a little mannish..
And she's a little mannish..

3.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's apartment. Monica sits on the couch and Phoebe 
is pacing up and down the room.

lines.Line:
I'm... I'm just... I'm the worst person ever. How can I not tell 
David that I'm seeing Mike
Maybe he didn't give you a chance
He said: Are you seeing someone? And I said no..
Oh, well... That had been your window

Yeah! I mean, I don't know. I was just , I was looking, I was looking 
in his eyes and I was just thinking: Oh my God! It's David. David's here. He's 
just, he's so irresistible
Really? The scientist guy
Really? The scientist guy
Really? Chandler
Really? Chandler
Continue..
Continue..

Oh.Okay, then it gets worse, 'cause then I told him that I would see 
him tomorrow night
Phoebe
Phoebe

I know! (points at herself) Evil! And... and... and... I like Mike so 
much, you know. It's just going really well. Oh my God

Wow, isn't it ironic that David would show up on the same day that 
you and Mike exchange keys

(sarcastically) Uhuh... Yeah...!, you know. And given my life long 
search for irony, you can imagine how happy I am
What are you gonna do
What are you gonna do

I mean I guess, I just have to... tell David that nothing can happen 
between us. Unless I don't... You know, complicated moral situation, no right, 
no wrong..
You have to tell David
You have to tell David
Okay, I knew I should have had this conversation with Joey

4.SceneDescription: Ross and Rachel's apartment. They're interviewing Sandy.

lines.Line:
I really do understand how hard it's gotta be to leave your child with 
another person. I mean, it's leaving behind a piece of your heart... (Ross has 
got that bored/angry/skeptic look and Rachel is very emotional
Sandy, that's exactly what it is..
Are you gay? (Rachel turns to Ross in an embarrassed way
Ross
Ross
Ross
Ross

It's okay. I get that a lot doing what I do. But I am straight. I-I'm 
engaged actually
Oh
Oh
Oh
Her name is Deliah
Oh, that's pretty
(skeptic) So you're just like a... guy who's a nanny

I realise how it's... a bit unorthodox for some people, but I really 
believe, the most satisfying thing you can do with your life, is take care of a 
child
(on a yeah, right tone) Okay
(on a yeah, right tone) Okay

Like in my last job, I met Daniel when he was three weeks old. And I 
got to watch him grow into this awesome person... When I left, I said: I'll see 
you soon... And he said to me: Skdandy... (Ross and Rachel look puzzled) That 
was his name for me... I'll see you every day... right in... (points at his 
heart, but starts to cry before he can finish his sentence. Rachel tries to 
comfort him, but Ross has this "you've got to be kidding me" look all over 
him

Yeah, kids say all kinds of crap. (In the other room Emma starts to 
cry.
Oh God, she mu... she must need her diaper changed
Oh, oh, I can do it for her, if you want..
Oh, oh, I can do it for her, if you want..

Oh, that would be great! (Sandy leaves for Emma's room) I love him, I 
love him, I love him..
Oh, come on, Rach, he's a guy

So wh..? He's smart, he's qualified. Give me one good reason we 
shouldn't try him out
Because, it's weird
Because, it's weird
Why
Why
Why
Why

What kind of job is that for a man? A nanny? I-It's like if a woman 
wanted to be..
(she's got that "yeah, try to say it" look on her face) Yes
King
King
King
King

I er... I hope you don't mind. I used some of my home-made lotion on 
Emma. It's a mixture of calendula and honey cream. It'll dry that rash right up. 
Plus... It keeps the hands young... (it makes Rachel smile

(whispering and begging) Please? (Ross makes a "whatever" gesture) 
YES! Sandy you're hired

That's great! (He gets emotional again and waves his hand in front of 
his face in a feminine way, like trying to dry his tears) I'm sorry. It's 
just... such an emotional thing when you're welcomed into a new family..
Oooh... ***I really can't hear what she says*** come here
You gotta be at least bi..
You gotta be at least bi..

5.SceneDescription:
Phoebe's apartment. Phoebe just let David in who brought a bottle of 
wine.

lines.Line: Wow, you look even... more beautiful than you did yesterday
Oof..
Oof..

In fact, ehm... I going to kiss you now. (David holds Phoebe and wants 
to kiss her.
Oh, wait, wait
Oh, wait, wait

Yeah, I-I don't, I can't get away with stuff like that. I-I-It sounded 
sexy in my head, so I..

No, no, it's not that. (they go sit on the couch) Uhm... Remember 
when you asked me if I was seeing someone and I said no? Well, uhm... I am. His 
... his name is Mike
Oh... oh..
Oh... oh..
Yeah, I should have told you
No... well, yeah
No... well, yeah
I'm sorry, I'm sorry

Well, i-it's okay. I-I-I understand... Well, s... well, are you happy 
with this guy
I am happy
I am happy
I am happy

Damn it! I-I'm sorry. I-I don't mean that. I-I want you to be happy... 
But only with me. No, uhm... that's not fair. Uh, who cares, leave him!. Oh, I 
don't mean that. Yes I do... I'm sorry Uhm, I... I think I should probably 
uhm... go..

Well... but David, just... I just want you to know that... that... 
you know... telling you this... is one of the hardest things I've ever had to 
do

Well... just so you know... hearing it wasn't exactly a Vladnik 
carnival either... Can we at least hug goodbye

Of course, yeah.(they hug and Phoebe sighs... a little after that 
also David sighs and makes his way to the door) You know, a kiss on the cheek 
wouldn't be totally inappropriate..
No... no..
No... no..
No... no..
No... no..

I mean... (David kisses Phoebe on the cheek, makes his way to the 
door and turns around again
In Minsk..
In Minsk..
Yeah
Yeah

...it's uhm... i-it's two on each cheek and uhm... and one on the 
lips

Well, if that's what they do in Minsk... (They kiss 2 on each 
cheek... and then they pause... David turns to the door) In New York... it's... 
(and then David grabs her by her neck and kisses her full on the lips... They 
kiss passionately and cannot seem to stop.

6.SceneDescription:
Phoebe's apartment. She and David are still kissing each other in the 
living room.

lines.Line: Hmmm... No, no... No, I can't do this. It's bad

But... I-I-It's nice... A-a-and... nice is good. A-a-and good is not 
bad, ergo, w-w-we should keep kissing
No, no. No
No, no. No
But... ergo..

Look David, if... if you had never left, then... yeah, we'd probably 
still be together right now, but... you did leave, and I-I'm with Mike and I 
really care about him..

Uhm... uhm... Goodbye... Uh... Schto ya ztez vigul... ui... (David 
holds his hands gently on the back of Phoebe's neck. There's a sound of a a 
bunch of keys rattling, and the door opens... It's Mike

Well... hey, the key works...! (he looks as if he doesn't want to 
believe what's happening
(points to David) And you thanks for the face massage. Thank you

7.SceneDescription: Phoebe's apartment. David is still there. Mike closes the door.

lines.Line: So... how many guys have your key

No, no, no, no, no... It's not... it's not... i'ts not as bad as it 
looks... really. I was just saying goodbye to an old friend
Your lipstick's on his mouth
Oh, uh... we just uh... happen to wear the same shade

No, uhm... David and I did use to go out... but years ago, and he 
lives in Minsk. He's only... he's only in town for a couple of days
Did you uhm..
Did you uhm..
Did you uhm..
Did you uhm..
No, no...
...kiss him
...kiss him
Oh, well, yeah..

Yes, but uhm... You should know... she really likes you. I-In fact 
I-I-I don't think you realise j-just how lucky you are fella. (he points at 
Mike
Don't point your finger at me
Why? Wh-What are you going to do about it

Well... I'll... just show you what I'm gonna do about it... (he hits 
David's finger with his finger and they start to finger-fight using their 
fingers as swords saying all kinds of macho crap

Stop it! Stop it, before someone gets really hurt! (they stop and 
Phoebe gets David's jacket and gives it to him) Here David, you should just 
go

Allright... But... if I ever do come back from Minsk... (points at 
Mike) well, you just better watch out
Well, if I ever goto Minsk, you'd better watch out
Well, if I ever goto Minsk, you'd better watch out
Oh, you're going to Minsk
Oh, you're going to Minsk
Well, I might

Really? Well, if you do, come in the spring. It's just lovely 
there
Okay, well... guys
Okay, well... guys
Right... Goodbye Phoebe. (Makes a move to kiss her.
Hey, what are you kidding me

Right-o, right-o... (to Mike) Take good care of her. (and he 
leaves

I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. If you... If you want your key back, I 
totally understand
It's never gonna happen again right
It's never gonna happen again right

Right! Never! Never! I swear! (They kiss... The door opens and David 
comes in again.

I-I... Oh I...I just wanna say uhm... if you do ever come to Minsk, 
that's my number (gives Mike a business card) We'll uhm... we'll party up 
Vladnik style. (He leaves again

8.SceneDescription:
Ross and Rachel's kitchen. Ross got a beer from the refrigerator and 
opens the bottle. Rachel now also enters the kitchen.

lines.Line: That was kind of rude

Oh, I'm sorry. Please apologise to Sandy and the Snufflebumps for 
me
You know, he was just doing his job..

Well, you know what... I-I'm sorry I'm the only one who isn't in love 
with Gary Poppins out there... But I just... I can't... I can't go through with 
this
Oh, come on Ross..
Oh, come on Ross..

No! Hey, you know what? I'm sorry. I would never force you... to hire 
someone you were this uncomfortable with..
(sighs) Oh... That's true
(sighs) Oh... That's true
Thank you
Thank you

Well, you're the one who wants to fire him, so you're gonna have to 
do it. (Ross walks to the living room determined to fire Sandy

9.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's apartment. Monica and Joey are sitting at the 
dinner table. Chandler comes from the bedroom with his suitcase.

lines.Line:
Well, I'm off to Tulsa, so if your Maitre D. friend has any funny 
Oklahoma jokes, tell him to e-mail me at http://www.hahanotsomuch.com/

Honey, you can relax. Last night at work, Geoffrey told this really 
sexist joke. After that, not so funny anymore

Really...? See... that's the thing: you gotta keep it smart, 
people
Okay, don't miss that flight. You know I love you

I love you too. (Monica and Chandler kiss. He turns to Joey.) 
And... I like you as a friend. (They hug and pat each other on the back.)
Allright. See you later
Allright. See you later
See ya! (he leaves the apartment
(to Monica) Did that guy really make that joke

Naaaa... He still kills me. Last night he had me laughing so hard, I 
swear... a little pee came out

10.SceneDescription:
Joey's apartment. Joey and Sandy are sitting at the kitchen counter. 
Joey is holding mr. Wigglemunch, and Sandy holds the Grumpus.

lines.Line: And what's the one kind of boat that can never, ever sink
What kind
A friend-ship..
Wow! You blow my mind..
Wow! You blow my mind..
Oh, I gotta go
Aaahh... How much do I owe you
Twenty bucks
Twenty bucks
Twenty bucks
It's like the cheapest college ever
